2.0.name: wordpress/my-qr-code
2.0.description: You can use these in your sales pitch to your "Local Offline businesses", you can add the QR Code tag to ANY NEW or EXISTING post or page by clicking the 'Add Tag' widget to insert the short code that displays the 'QR Tag' where you want it to be displayed in your post, click to publish or update the post to finish the procedure.
